content: We offer tire services including rotation, balancing, flat repair, and new tire sales and installation.
Brake services include pad replacement, rotor resurfacing, and ABS diagnostics.
Walk-ins are welcome, but appointments are recommended for faster service.
Most oil changes are completed within 30–45 minutes.
Pinkys Auto Care is located at Rte 112, Yorkjuh, JH 98746. We're open Monday through Friday from 8am to 6pm, and Saturday from 9am to 2pm.
At Pinkys Auto Care, we combine modern diagnostics with friendly, small-town service. Our ASE-certified mechanics serve Springfield with over 15 years of experience.
My car shakes when braking—do I need new rotors?
Can you align wheels on a 2021 Subaru Outback?
